Intervention in the House in tribute to the victims of the attacks of March 22, 2016 #hommage #Brussels https://t.co/9JsEk5vPXS
"On March 22, the horror hit us in the heart, our thoughts go primarily to the victims and their loved ones." #home #Brussels
"I would like to salute the admirable courage of the relief, police, intelligence and defense services." #home #Brussels
"Our free and joyful way of life, we hold it as the apple of our eyes." #home #Brussels
"We must strengthen security and our services must be endowed with the necessary human and financial means." #home #Brussels
"Regions, Communities, Federal State, in harmony, join forces." #home #Brussels
"The victims & families of the victims have the right to understand 1 commission of inquiry will have to make all the light" #hommage #Brussels
"The battle against hatred also goes through Europe - a stronger Europe, focused on the interests of its citizens." #home #Brussels
"Belgians & Europeans must support the search for sustainable peace & democratic transition for the benefit of the people" #home #Brussels
"In the world that is watching us, we will show an exemplary, dignified and strong Belgium, which is the challenge we are imposing." #home #Brussels
"To stand up is to demonstrate that we are determined that with all countries of freedom." #home #Brussels
"Our Belgium will remain what it is: solidarity, open, tolerant, beautiful and proud." #home #Brussels
"More than ever, we remain and will remain lovers of freedom." #home #Brussels

The pain of Bosnian Muslims who were slaughtered in 1995 in the middle of Europe will always remain in our hearts.
The verdict of ICT will not bring back thousands of murdered Bosnians.
The ceremony I attended in the 10th year of the Srebrenica massacre is one of the most memorable and sad moments of my life.
We will always feel the pain of Bosnian Muslims murdered in the middle of Europe in 1995.
Though the decision of the ICC does not bring back thousands of Bosnian killed, at least it can prevent such embarrassing events from happening in the future.
